description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。现任中华人民共和国公安部党委委员、副部长，国家禁毒委员会副主任，副总警监警衔。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China. He is currently a member of the Party Committee and Vice Minister of the Ministry of Public Security of the People's Republic of China, Deputy Director of the National Narcotics Control Commission, and holds the police rank of Deputy Commissioner General.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国直辖市。
description.en: A municipality directly under the Central Government of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 天津市的一所高等院校，徐大彤毕业时期的名称。
description.en: A university in Tianjin, this was its name when Xu Datong graduated.

description.en: The functional department of the Shaanxi Provincial People's Government responsible for public security work throughout the province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的议事协调机构，负责组织、协调、指导全国的禁毒工作。
description.en: An advisory and coordinating body of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for organizing, coordinating, and guiding national drug control efforts.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国人民警察警衔制度中的副部级警衔。
description.en: A police rank for vice-ministerial level officials in the People's Police rank system of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 徐大彤接替王小宁担任中国共产党天津市武清区委员会书记。
description.en: Xu Datong succeeded Wang Xiaoning as Secretary of the CPC Tianjin Wuqing District Committee.

description.zh-cn: 戴东强接替徐大彤担任中国共产党天津市武清区委员会书记。
description.en: Dai Dongqiang succeeded Xu Datong as Secretary of the CPC Tianjin Wuqing District Committee.

description.zh-cn: 徐大彤接替许红星担任中国共产党天津经济技术开发区工作委员会书记。
description.en: Xu Datong succeeded Xu Hongxing as Secretary of the CPC Tianjin Economic-Technological Development Area Working Committee.

description.zh-cn: 郑伟铭接替徐大彤担任中国共产党天津经济技术开发区工作委员会书记。
description.en: Zheng Weiming succeeded Xu Datong as Secretary of the CPC Tianjin Economic-Technological Development Area Working Committee.

description.zh-cn: 徐大彤接替刘跃进担任国家禁毒委员会办公室主任。
description.en: Xu Datong succeeded Liu Yuejin as Director of the Office of the National Narcotics Control Commission.

description.zh-cn: 徐大彤接替胡明朗担任陕西省公安厅厅长。
description.en: Xu Datong succeeded Hu Minglang as Director of the Shaanxi Provincial Public Security Department.

description.zh-cn: 戴彬彬接替徐大彤担任陕西省公安厅厅长。
description.en: Dai Binbin succeeded Xu Datong as Director of the Shaanxi Provincial Public Security Department.

description.zh-cn: 徐大彤接替王盛担任天津经济技术开发区管理委员会主任。
description.en: Xu Datong succeeded Wang Sheng as Director of the Tianjin Economic-Technological Development Area Administrative Committee.

description.zh-cn: 郑伟铭接替徐大彤担任天津经济技术开发区管理委员会主任。
description.en: Zheng Weiming succeeded Xu Datong as Director of the Tianjin Economic-Technological Development Area Administrative Committee.

description.zh-cn: 徐大彤接替崔广志担任中新天津生态城管理委员会主任。
description.en: Xu Datong succeeded Cui Guangzhi as Director of the Sino-Singapore Tianjin Eco-city Administrative Committee.

description.zh-cn: 单泽峰接替徐大彤担任中新天津生态城管理委员会主任。
description.en: Shan Zefeng succeeded Xu Datong as Director of the Sino-Singapore Tianjin Eco-city Administrative Committee.
